custom-meta.meta-value: © BioMed Central Ltd., part of Springer Nature 2023

body.p: The original article [1] has incomplete funding information. The sponsorship from Takeda Pharmaceutical Australia to cover the Article Processing Charge was not mentioned in the Funding note.
The correct Funding note is as follows:

This work was supported by an Australian Government Research Training Program Scholarship. The article has received sponsorship from Takeda Pharmaceutical Australia to cover the Article Processing Charge.
The original article [1] has been corrected.

fn.p: Springer Nature remains neutral with regard to jurisdictional claims in published maps and institutional affiliations.

element-citation.article-title: Childhood maltreatment, shame, psychological distress, and binge eating: testing a serial mediational model
